definitions.definition: A genre of aggressive lo-fi guitar -driven music with predominantly screaming vocals , while preserving structural aspects of the emocore / hardcore emo genres of the early 1990's.
A genre of guitar-driven music combining late 1990's emo indie rock with interludes of screaming vocals, often accompanied by hardcore or metalcore guitar riffs.
Any punk rock -inspired music that involves screaming vocals, typically referring to the genres described above as well as certain subgenres of hardcore punk .
Any aggressive music with screamed vocals.

main_definition: ( music ) A genre of aggressive lo-fi guitar -driven music with predominantly screaming vocals , while preserving structural aspects of the emocore / hardcore emo genres of the early 1990's.
secondary_definitions: ( music ) A genre of guitar-driven music combining late 1990's emo indie rock with interludes of screaming vocals, often accompanied by hardcore or metalcore guitar riffs.
( music ) Any punk rock -inspired music that involves screaming vocals, typically referring to the genres described above as well as certain subgenres of hardcore punk .
( music , often derogatory ) Any aggressive music with screamed vocals.
